# fstnii

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.com/muschellij2/fstnii.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/muschellij2/fstnii)
[![AppVeyor build status](https://ci.appveyor.com/api/projects/status/github/muschellij2/fstnii?branch=master&svg=true)](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/muschellij2/fstnii)

The goal of fstnii is to create Random Access Imaging Data

## Installation

You can install the released version of fstnii from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("fstnii")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("muschellij2/fstnii")
```
## Example

```{r example}
library(fstnii)
## basic example code
```
